data.text:
Mary Margaret White, 68, of Dickinson, passed away May 12, 2024. Mary was born May 9, 1956 in New Orleans, she was raised by her loving parents Billie Jewell and John Abel Goux in Lake Charles. She was an RN for the emergency department at UTMB for years. Mary loved to dance, she and her husband Bruce danced at SSQQ, Melody Club, among many other dance groups. She will be remembered as a loving wife, mother, grandmother, and great-grandmother.

Mary was preceded in death by her parents, and daughter Rachel White.

She leaves behind to cherish her memory her beloved husband of 46 years Bruce White; daughters Sarah Darnold and spouse Ian, and Deborah Peace and spouse Jennifer; son Joshua White and spouse Lucy; Grandchildren, James (Evelyn) Rodriguez, Helena Rodriguez, Brianna Rodriguez, Gabrielle Darnold, Damian Darnold, Honor White, Autumn Peace, Alexander Peace, and Amelia Peace; great-grandchildren Catherine Rodriguez, Abel Rodriguez, Kyleigh Dooley, Madyson Dooley, Syvannah Dooley, Ava Carrillo, and Mia Carrillo; and numerous other family members and friends.

In her honor there will be a visitation 8:30 – 10:00 am, with funeral services at 10:00 am, Wednesday, May 15, 2024, Crowder Funeral Home Chapel, Dickinson. Interment will follow at Hayes Grace Memorial Park, Hitchcock, TX.
